hero.title: Clean home, clean conscience
hero.subtitle: 100% plant-based, non-toxic cleaning products. Safe for kids, pets, and the planet. Professional results without harsh chemicals. Breathe easier knowing your home is truly clean and healthy.

about.title: Truly Green Cleaning
about.subtitle: Healthy homes, healthy planet
about.content: EcoSpark uses only certified organic, plant-based cleaning products. No harsh chemicals, no toxic fumes, no residue. We prove that eco-friendly cleaning can deliver spotless results. Perfect for families with allergies, asthma, or environmental concerns.

products.name: Eco Home Cleaning
products.description: Complete home cleaning with plant-based products. Kitchen, bathrooms, floors. Toxin-free and pet-safe. Perfect for weekly or bi-weekly service.

products.name: Green Deep Clean
products.description: Intensive eco-friendly deep cleaning. Natural disinfection, organic products throughout. Great for allergy sufferers.

products.name: Nursery & Kids' Room
products.description: Extra-safe cleaning for baby nurseries and kids' rooms. Chemical-free, hypoallergenic products only.

products.name: Allergen-Free Package
products.description: HEPA vacuuming, natural dust removal, and air purification. Ideal for asthma and allergy sufferers.

products.name: Pet-Friendly Cleaning
products.description: 100% pet-safe products. Remove pet hair, odors, and stains naturally. Safe for all pets.

products.name: Monthly Eco Plan
products.description: Four weekly eco-cleanings per month. Lock in this rate. Same green team every time.

items.text: My son has severe asthma and regular cleaners made it worse. EcoSpark's products don't trigger any symptoms. Our home is cleaner than ever and we can actually breathe!
items.author: Rachel Thompson
items.title: Mom of 2

items.text: I love that our home is spotless without exposing our toddler to chemicals. EcoSpark's plant-based products work just as well. Peace of mind is worth it!
items.author: Emily Garcia
items.title: New Parent

items.text: As someone passionate about the environment, I was thrilled to find truly eco-friendly cleaners. Great service, effective products, and guilt-free clean!
items.author: Jordan Park
items.title: Eco-Conscious Client

members.name: Maya Rodriguez
members.title: Founder & Green Cleaning Specialist
members.bio: Founded EcoSpark after her daughter developed chemical sensitivities. Certified in green cleaning methods. Passionate about proving eco-friendly works.
